Object.Name: Atmospheric CO2 Concentration Measurements
Object.Description1: Control and read CO2 sensor measurements. If "Stored Measurement Count" reaches maximum capacity (TBD), each new measurement causes oldest to be removed from list. Changes to "Enable" and "Measurement Interval" resources causes stored measurements to be cleared.

Item.Name: Measurements
Item.Description: List of measurements. CO2 concentration ppm. First resource being oldest measurement.

Item.Name: Clear Measurements
Item.Description: Resource executed without parameter clears all measurements. If Unix Timestamp parameter is provided, clears measurements till provided time.
